subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Spurs’ Bruce Bowen, who has made a career of frustrating oppenents with his defense, earned a mild rebuke from the league for his foul in Game 3 when he kneed Phoenix guard Steve Nash in the groin.
snippet: The Spurs’ Bruce Bowen, who has made a career of frustrating oppenents with his defense, earned a mild rebuke from the league for his foul in Game 3 when he kneed Phoenix guard Steve Nash in the groin.
